Located on the northwest coast of Java, it has an area of 661 square kilometres (255 sq mi) and a 2010 census count population of 9,580,000. Jakarta is the country's economic, cultural and political centre. It is the most populous city in Indonesia and in Southeast Asia, and is the tenth-largest city in the world. Gear up, let your adventurous spirit take over, and explore a city that has so many things to offer!</span></p> <p><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141016/Jakarta-detail_1.jpg" /><br /></span></p> 1851935 Jeju: UNESCO Tour (East). Includes Transportation + Admission Fees + Lunch + Tour Guide. http://www.alldealsasia.com/affiliate/35852/daily-deal/ada/singapore/jeju-unesco-tour-east-includes-transportation-admission-fees-lunch-tour-guide https://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/deals/jeju-tour-main.jpg S$180 S$99 45.00% 2015-03-19 11:00 2015-05-05 11:00 2015-05-15 11:00 13 2015-05-15 Holiday Guru 1.303499 103.861257 Travel 200 Jalan Sultan, 199018 <p><strong>ITINERARY:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Hotel – Jeju Stone Cultural Park – Seong-eup&nbsp;Folk Village – Lunch – Haenyeo Performance – Seongsan&nbsp;Sunrise Peak – Manjanggul Cave – Shilla Duty Free Shop –&nbsp;Hotel (Bus Stop)</li> </ul> <p><strong>Jeju Stone Cultural Park</strong></p> <p>The most usual stones on Jeju are black basalt with many holes. Jeju Stone Cultural Park is the best-known spot with a collection of these rocks, and others found on the island. The historic and cultural park preserves the identity, locality and artistry of Jeju Island through the display of more than 14,000 exhibits.</p> <p><strong>Seong-eup Folk Village</strong></p> <p>Seongeup Folk Village is a small town that holds a vast amount of Jeju culture. And cultural properties in the folk village have been handed down from generation to generation. The Seongeup Folk Village shows the unique culture of Jeju Island: the black lava rock walls, and the stone grandfather statues (Harubang), which have become a prime feature of the landscape.</p> <p><strong>Haenyeo Performance</strong></p> <p>The mermaids living on Jeju Island are actually haenyeo, or Korean female divers. You can enjoy haenyeo performance at Seongsan Ilchulbong Peak. Watch the women dive into the water to capture seafood in the coastal waters. One of the main attractions of the show is the “sumbisori,” the sharp whistling exhalation sound haenyeo make upon resurfacing.</p> <p><strong>Seongsan Sunrise Peak</strong></p> <p>Seongsan Sunrise Peak rose from under the sea in a volcanic eruption over 5,000 years ago. Located on the eastern end of Jeju Island, there is a huge crater at the top of Seongsan Sunrise Peak. The crater is about 600m in diameter and 90m high with the 99 sharp rocks surrounding the crater. And it was designated by UNESCO as World Nature Heritage in 2007, and named a New 7 Wonder in 2011.</p> <p><strong>Manjanggul Lava Tube</strong></p> <p><strong></strong>The lava tube stretches for as far as an approximate 7,400 m, its length ranks amongst the top 15 in the world. It is also the largest lava tube in Jeju Island. It is regarded as having significant scientific and heritage value, owing to its excellent condition of preservation despite its age of formation is about 300,000 to 200,000 years ago.&nbsp;</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/Jeju-tour-Detail.jpg" height="1933" width="600" /></p> 1851936 Jeju: Volcanic Island Tour (West). Includes Transportation + Admission Fees + Lunch + Tour Guide http://www.alldealsasia.com/affiliate/35852/daily-deal/ada/singapore/jeju-volcanic-island-tour-west-includes-transportation-admission-fees-lunch https://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/deals/volcanic-island-tour-main.jpg S$185 S$99 46.00% 2015-03-19 11:00 2015-05-05 11:00 2015-05-15 11:00 12 2015-05-15 Holiday Guru 1.303499 103.861257 Travel 200 Jalan Sultan, 199018 <p><strong>ITINERARY:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Hotel – Folklore and Natural History Museum – Songaksan Mountain – Lunch – Teddy Bear Museum – Jusangjeollidae – Lotte Duty Free – Cheonjiyeon Waterfall</li> </ul> <p><strong>Songaksan Mountain</strong></p> <p>Songaksan Mountain is also called 99 Bong (99 Peaks) due to its 99 small peaks. The road from Sanbanggulsa Temple in Southern Jeju to Songaksan Mountain is a famous coastal drive with breathtaking scenic views. The view from the peak of Songaksan is truly scenic. From the summit, one can see nearby islands such as Mapado, Gapado, and Hyeongjeseom, and as far as Hallasan Mountain and the Pacific Ocean.</p> <p><strong>Teddy Bear Museum</strong></p> <p>Korea's first and largest teddy bear museum. It includes dolls made by famous Korean and foreign artists. The museum houses two galleries, you can view the teddy bears from various countries.</p> <p><strong>Jusangjeollidae</strong></p> <p>A popular spot for vacationers and locals due to its impressive pillar rock formation named Jungmun Daepo Beach Jusangjeollidae. The formation looks like a piece of art that has been sculpted delicately with a sharp tool. Jusangjeollidae usually refers to vertical pillar shaped rocks in a rectangular or hexagonal shape and is often composed of basaltic lava.</p> <p><strong>Cheonjiyeon Waterfall</strong></p> <p>Cheonjiyeon means a pond created by “the meeting sky and land.” The white column of thunderous water falling from the cliff is a magnificent sight. It is 22m in height and 12m in width. Around the waterfall are Natural Monument #163 dampalsu trees which grow naturally here and temperate plants like camellia form a dense forest.&nbsp;</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/VOLCANIC-ISLAND-TOUR-Detail.jpg" height="1567" width="600" /></p> 1852065 Jeju: Sea of Love Tour. The main distinguishing feature of the mosque is its enormous &nbsp;domed roof which is 15m high, 15m in diameter and is supported entirely without beams. The mosque is &nbsp;adorned with handmade Persian rugs and chandeliers presented by kings of countries allied with Taiwan. &nbsp;The mosque also has two minarets that rise impressively to over 20m.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Alishan Park: From breathtaking sunsets and seas of clouds, to enchanting forest and old railway, Alishan is one of the beautiful scenery in Taiwan. At the Hanok village, you can participate in traditional Korean activities such as archery and enjoy traditional Korean performances as well.</p> <p><strong>N Seoul Tower</strong></p> <p>The N Seoul Tower, a complex culture space in Seoul, is where the clouds seem to meet with Namsan Mountain. It shows visitors the harmony of Namsan’s nature, the 21st century state of the art, restingwith leisure, and various cultures.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/Namsan_detail.jpg" height="2945" width="600" /></p> 1852883 Seoul DMZ TOUR: Includes Transportation, Admission Fee, and Tour Guide. It will be a great opportunity to experience a rare traditional scene in Korea.</p> <p><strong>Gyeongbokgung Palace</strong></p> <p>Gyeongbokgung Palace was the first royal palace built by the Joseon Dynasty. It was located at the heart of newly appointed capital of Seoul and represented the sovereignty of the Joseon Dynasty.</p> <p><strong>The National Folk Museum</strong></p> <p>The National Folk Museum of Korea displays the culture and folk history of the Korean people from prehistoric times to the end of the Joseon Dynasty.</p> <p><strong>Blue House</strong></p> <p>Cheongwadae (Blue House) is the presidential residence of the Republic of Korea and is regarded as the heart of the nation. It is comprised of the main presidential office, reception rooms, conference rooms and living quarters, annexes for Chunchugwan and Yeongbingwan, the Security Service Office, and gardens and ponds in front and back.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/DMZ-Tour_detail.jpg" /></p> 1852953 Seoul NAMI-ISLAND & PETITE FRANCE TOUR: Includes Transportation, Lunch, Admission Fee, and Tour Guide. It boasts wide open grassy areas suitable for picnics and recreation surrounded by chestnut and popular trees. For Koreans and international visitors the island is an oasis suitable for leisurely strolls or romantic dates. Facilities that have served to support these cultural efforts including the UNICEF Hall, YWCA Lipia Garden, Andersen Hall, Nami Cultural Center, the Hands-on Learning Center, the Song Museum, the Arists’ Retreat, Recycling Center, Gallery Nami, and Bonsai Garden. Nami-island is a place where nature and human beings live peacefully in harmony with understanding and respectfor each other.</p> <p><strong>Petite France</strong></p> <p>Petite France is a French cultural village set in the Korean countrysideand it serves as both a French Cultural village and a youth trainingfacility, and consists of 16 French-style building where visitors can lodgeand experience French food, clothing, and household culture. Theconcept of the Petite France encapsulates ‘flowers, stars, and the Little Prince.’ The village contains a memorial hall dedicated to Saint- Exupery, the author of the celebrated French novel, Le Petite Prince (1943) and as such it is called the Little Prince theme park.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/Nami_Island_detail_1.jpg" /><br /><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/Nami_Island_detail_2.jpg" height="2261" width="600" /></p> 1852961 Seoul K-BEAUTY CLASS TOUR: Includes Transportation + Admission Fee + K-Beauty Class with US$150 Worth of Make-Up Kit. It will be a great opportunity to experience a rare traditional scene in Korea.</p> <p><strong>Gyeongbokgung Palace</strong></p> <p>Gyeongbokgung Palace was the first royal palace built by the Joseon Dynasty. It was located at the heart of newly appointed capital of Seoul and represented the sovereignty of the Joseon Dynasty.</p> <p><strong>The National Folk Museum</strong></p> <p>The National Folk Museum of Korea displays the culture and folk history of the Korean people from prehistoric times to the end of the Joseon Dynasty.</p> <p><strong>Blue House</strong></p> <p>Cheongwadae (Blue House) is the presidential residence of the Republic of Korea and is regarded as the heart of the nation. It is comprised of the main presidential office, reception rooms, conference rooms and living quarters, annexes for Chunchugwan and Yeongbingwan, the Security Service Office, and gardens and ponds in front and back.</p> <p><strong>COEX Aquarium</strong></p> <p>Aquarium designed around the theme of “Water Journey” has no less than 40,000 sea creatures. Visitors embark on a journey once stepping into the aquarium from high Andean mountain waters through the Amazon tropical rainforest to rivers and swamps.</p> <p><strong>Sinsa-dong Garosugil</strong></p> <p>Garosugil known as ‘tree lined streets’ are known for its artistic sensibilities. Lined with gingko trees, Garosugil has beautiful scenery in the spring and fall with their golden leaves and its unique bohemian atmosphere. Equipped with cafés, restaurants, bars, fashion shop blending into their chic cityscape.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20150301/GANGNAM-CITY-TOUR-Detail.jpg" /></p> 1854725 NEW! The scenic drives takes you through rustic towns, paddy fields and rural countryside scenery. On arrival at Kota Kilas, enjoy a Malay Hi-Tea of coffee/tea, local snacks before you board a motor boat for a river cruise in seach of the elusive Proboscis Monkey, the rare silver leaf monkey, the mischievous longtailed macaques and myriad species of birds that inhabit this unique riverine environment.&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">As dusk falls, look-out for crocodiles lurking by the riverbanks. On a moonless night be mesmerized by the filickering lights of fireflies against the night sky.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">Enjoy a Malay village-style buffet dinner and immerse yourself in the sounds of nature in this rustic setting. After dinner, take the same route back to the hotel.&nbsp;</span></li> </ul> <p><em><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">(Note : Allthough there is a high possibility of wildlife sightings &nbsp;due to their habit of resting or mating by the riverbanks in the evening, wildlife sightings are not guaranteed)&nbsp;</span></em></p> <p><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;"></span><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">DAY 03: MAMUTIK ISLAND EXCURSION (B, L)</span></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After breakfast, transfer to Sutera Harbour Jetty for an exciting day at the beaches. Enjoy views of Wanquan River honored as the mother river of Hainan. Bus pass the view of the Statue of women soldiers army that well known all over China. Visit the new tour spots: Meiya village and the theme Bar of the sea- story; Then soon you will get to a place named for BoAo Water City, where very near to the sea, in which The BoAo Forum for Asia is located, being considered as a very famous international conference organization. Visit the outside view of the establishment of BoAo conference site, experiencing the atmosphere of the gathering to this pleasure and amazing land for those who are both of Asian larders and top business leaders annually. you can choose a cruise trip along Yudaitan (Jade Belt Beach) (at you own expense). This is a beach which separates the river and the sea. The sands have two colors, presenting two kinds of scenery. Then visit for Baoshutang, enjoy the amazing scenery of Fragrant Water Bay and You can see a mangrove forest along the beach and Niuling Ridge wrapped in cloud all the year round go to the city of Sanya. You can visit the significant scenery of Sanya Bay by boat in the evening (at your own expense)</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">Acommodation: SANYA&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">4-Star Hotel：Jingwei seaview hotel or other same levels</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">Day 3 </span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;"><breakfast/lunch/dinner></span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">: </span></span></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px; background-color: transparent;">After breakfast, bus pass the view of the Coconut Palm-lined Seafront Avenues on the coach (YeMengChangLang) and “the Crown of Beauty’’which for the location of the Miss World Contest. arriving at Sekupang International Ferry Terminal, you will be greeted by the tour guide and escorted to an awaiting air-conditioned bus before proceeding for the One Day Batam City & Shopping Tour, en route, you will visit:&nbsp;<br /></span></p> <ul> <li>Maha Vihara Duta Maitreya Temple</li> <li>Polo Outlet</li> <li>Indonesia Miniature Park</li> <li>Golden Bay City (Go Karting, Sea Sport, City & Shopping Tour, en route, you will visit:&nbsp;<br /></span></p> <ul> <li>Maha Vihara Duta Maitreya Temple</li> <li>Polo Outlet</li> <li>Indonesia Miniature Park</li> <li>Golden Bay City (Go It may be tufted or woven material. It is known worldwide with a long history of traditional arts and crafts. Floor mats are good for covering residential houses, hotels, stadiums, exhibition halls, vehicles, ships, aircrafts and other ground. They provide noise reduction, thermal insulation, and decorative effects.</p> <p>Floor mats provide a breathable rug with its tight structure, and can function as acoustic isolation for good sound effects. They can also improve air quality. The floor mat surface can capture floating dust particles in the air. FREE Normal Mail. Ideal for Parties and Occasions! Choose from 2 Price Options. Courier Delivery Option Available http://www.alldealsasia.com/affiliate/35852/daily-deal/ada/singapore/bake-pop-pan-set-free-courier-delivery-good-20-pcs-cake-pops-ideal-parties-14Jan2015 https://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/deals/bakepanmain-1.jpg S$39.9 S$15.9 60.00% 2015-01-20 11:00 2015-05-05 11:00 2015-07-31 11:00 15 2015-07-31 Eureka World 00 00 Lifestyle <p style="text-align: left;"><strong>How to Make Cake Pops in 9 Simple Steps</strong> <em>(Make approx 40 Cake Pops):</em></p> <p style="text-align: left;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">You need:</span><br />2 eggs<br />3/4 cup (190 ml) sugar<br />1/4 cup (60 ml) sunflower oil<br />1/4 cup (60 ml) warm water<br />1 cup (250 ml) cake flour<br />30g cocoa powder<br />1 tsp (5 ml) baking powder<br />1/2 tsp bicarbonate of soda<br />Pinch of salt<br />40 cake pop sticks<br />1 chocolate<br />Decorations of your choice</p> <p style="text-align: left;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Method</span></p> <ol> <li>Preheat the oven to 180°C.</li> <li>Grease and flour both halves of the cake pop mould. If you don’t do this, the cake pops will stick to the mould.</li> <li>In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar, sunflower oil and water until thoroughly combined.</li> <li>Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder, bicarbonate of soda and salt and add them to the egg mixture. Mix until combined.</li> <li>Place the bottom half of the mould (the one without the holes) onto a baking tray. With a 1/2 Tbsp measure, scoop the batter into the holes so they’re about 3/4 full.</li> <li>Secure the top and bake for about 15 minutes on the baking tray. The tiny holes at the top will let the steam out while baking.</li> <li>When the pops are done, leave them to cool in the silicone mould before removing them. I put mine in the freezer for about half an hour, as this makes them easier to coat.</li> <li>Temper your chocolate. Dip one end of the cake pop sticks into the chocolate and insert them into the cake pops. Allow them to set in the fridge for 5 minutes.</li> <li>When the sticks have been secured, you can dip the cake pops in the chocolate to coat them and then sprinkle with decorations. Mine dried upside down on a platter but you can also stick the pops in polystyrene to dry upright.</li> </ol> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20140328/Bake_Pan_detail.jpg" /></p> 1792968 Ninja Coat Hook: Unique Coat Hook for an Innovative Home. Includes Free Normal Mail http://www.alldealsasia.com/affiliate/35852/daily-deal/ada/singapore/micro-needle-roller-05mm-helps-skin-absorb-moisturizers-and-serums-1000-times-15Jan2015 https://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/deals/micro-needle-rollermain.jpg S$39.99 S$16.9 58.00% 2015-01-16 11:00 2015-05-05 11:00 2015-07-31 11:00 24 2015-07-31 Beauty Box 00 00 Beauty Products <p><strong>How to Use the Micro Needle Roller:&nbsp;</strong></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Before use, you should thoroughly wash and pat dry any&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">skin areas that you are going to treat, including washing&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">your hands thoroughly. Do not use on eyelids or lips.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Apply a numbing antiseptic gel to the skin being&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">treated. If you are doing your face, please make sure to&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">keep the gel away from your eyes.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Wipe off any excess gel with a paper towel.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Gently and slowly roll the roller across your skin 4&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">times back and forth and right and left diagonally over&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">every area of skin being treated.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">No blood should be visible if light pressure is used,&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">although you may see some temporary reddening. Sunblock&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">can actually prevent reddening.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Dip a clean face cloth into a bowl of iced water and&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">dab on the areas treated (This will help reduce the&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">pores). A clicking sound means successful contact between the buckle and the patch.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Tear away the protective film covering the defatting patch and apply on the parts to be exercised so as to ensure a perfect and close contact between the main slimming unit and your body</span></li> </ol> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Instructions for Device Usage:</span></strong></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Press the "ON/OFF/SET" key, to switch on the device. The switch indicator lamp will light up.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Once the switch indicator lamp is on, "A" will be indicated on the display screen of the main unit.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The number "1" indicated on the display means that the device is in the lowest current level.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Choose the required mode properly by using the "SET" switching key.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After the mode is selected, adjust the current to the intensity based on your slimming needs. While adjusting, the display will change from speed levels 1 to 9. The higher number on the display, the stronger the speed/current flowing through the device. This allows you to adjust the current to the intensity suited to yourself.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After 15 minutes of usage, the device will switch off automatically. If you want to switch off the unit anytime, you may press the ON/OFF/SET key continuously to turn off the power.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Attach the defatting patch back to the protective film and put the patch and main unit into the box after use</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Plus (+) <span>key</span>: Each pressing of this key will make the "1-9 level indicator lamp" display the number "1" automatically. Then, repeat the key and increase the current intensity.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Minus (-) key: Use this key to lower the level. Each press of this key will reduce the intensity by one level till it is switched off.</span></li> </ol> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Maintenance and Storage&nbsp;</span></strong></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Storage of defatting patch</span></span></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not store in a place exposed to direct sunlight, high temperature, humidity, dust and corrosive gas.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The adhesive portion of the defatting patch should be kept clean and and free from sweat spots especially oily substances. Otherwise, it may have an adverse impact on the normal use of defatting patch. In severe cases, it may result in damage of the defatting patch.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">When the defatting patch becomes less adhesive due to sweat, you can flush with small amount of water. After it is dried, it may restore its adhesiveness to a certain extent. Do not immerse the patch directly in water since it may cause failure and you have to buy new a patch.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not use other water soluble substances,&nbsp;<span>especially detergent and hot water,&nbsp;</span>for cleaning. Only use c<span>old clean water when cleaning the patch</span></span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Please put the defatting patch in a place beyond the reach of children.</span></li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Maintainance of Main Unit</span></span></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not let any type of liquid get inside the main unit. Do not store it in a place exposed to direct sunlight, high temperature, humidity and dust.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">In case any dirt gets into the main unit, please wipe with dry soft cloth; do not use highly corrosive liquid, volatile and gasoline agents, etc.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not dry the instrument using high heat (blow dryer, hair dryer, etc). Please store beyond the reach of children.</span></li> </ol> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141016/Kingdom_detail_1.jpg" height="3674" width="600" /></p> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Special Safety Precautions</span></strong></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Before use, please read the Safety precautions in the instruction manual and use accordingly</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Please use the instrument according to the operating sequence.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not disassemble or transform the instrument at your discretion. For repair, please consult a repair shop specializing in such devices.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not use the device for purposes beyond what the instruction manual specifies.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not put it beside a hot electric appliance so as to avoid fire, electric shock and other accidents.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Do not let children or persons with limited physical abilites use it. When used by minors, they should be accompanied and guided by adults.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The instrument must be properly attached to the target areas to be slimmed. If you are not feeling well or feel electric shock, please stop using it immediately.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Before use, please remove watch, necklace, bracelet, and other metal items and accessories from the body.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">When finished, clean the areas of the body where the device/patch was applied to. After 30 minutes, apply body lotion.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">For best results, use after showering or bathing.</span></li> </ol> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Troubleshooting</span></strong></p> <p><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">In case of any problems while operating, please follow the following troubleshooting guide. If the fault cannot be eliminated, please turn off the instrument and try again.</span></p> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">I. The switch cannot be started</span></span></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Check if the protective paper attached to the defatting patch is properly peeled off and in contact with the target area. The power will automatically turn off unless the protective adhesive is properly removed and in direct contact with the body part to be exercised</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the power is depleted, please charge the instrument before use</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">When the main unit is immersed in water, the core mechanism of the device will be damaged due to short circuit. In this case, you cannot start it. Only after it is completely dried up can it be restarted.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the defatting patch is used too frequently or damaged, please replace with new patch immediately.</span></li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">II. The stimulation emitted by the device is too weak or insufficient in frequency</span></span></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Check if the defatting patch is properly applied to the skin.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the current intensity is too weak and the display shows the lowest level setting, continue to press Plus (+) key to increase the intensity.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the battery is drained or already has low power, please recharge immediately.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the defatting patch is damaged, please replace immediately.</span></li> </ol> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">III. The black adhesive is too sticky</span></span></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Place it in a place with excessive humidity, flush with a small amount of water and use it again after natural drying</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If there is excessive sweating while using the device, wipe the excess sweat away from the patch and re-attach the device</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Replace the adhesive exercise patch with a new one when it shows signs of wear and tear.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the skin is slightly itchy and red after use, this may be a sign that the device is overused. It is recommended that you shorten usage time.</span></li> </ol> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141016/Kingdom_detail_2.jpg" height="2217" width="600" /></p> 1817489 24 Pieces of Mosquito Sticker Pad: Keep Mozzies Away From You & Your Loved Ones. With a pair of Pinhole Glasses, your eyesight will stop from deteriorating and in some cases, can even be improved. And stick with it long enough for 15minutes a day, for people with mildly poor visions, perhaps you might not even need to use glasses anymore!</p> <p>Natural Vision Therapy using Therapeutic glasses is a proven, non-intrusive, and holistic natural vision correction method to improving nearsightedness (myopia), astigmatism, farsightedness (hyperopia), and presbyopia (old-age blur) without the use of expensive prescriptive lenses, lasik surgery, or medical aids. The Therapy re-educates the eyes and mind about the principles and habits of seeing clearly and naturally.</p> <p>Its foundation is based on the Bates Method which is a time-tested solution for many functional vision problems since the 1890's. Dr. Bates, an ophthalmologist, stopped prescribing glasses to his clients after noticing that their eye problems, such as nearsightedness, farsightedness, astigmatism and lazy eye, got progressively worse after wearing the "eye crutches". He discovered that the glasses (eye crutches), actually prevents the eyes from healing itself naturally. Dr. Bates had helped thousands of adults and children to perfect sight without the use of glasses.</p> <p><strong>How Therapeutic Pinhole Glasses Work to Correct Your Vision:</strong></p> <p>The Therapeutic Pinhole Glasses look like sunglasses. But instead of lenses, they have a thin sheet of perforated plastic replacing them, and allow extremely narrow parallel beam of light through the holes, eliminating the scattering of light. In turn, this reduces the circle of confusion on the retina - which usually is seen as blurriness in vision. Thus, wearing the glasses is both relaxing and beneficial as the entire retina gets stimulated and exercised. With only 15 minutes of regular use, you can correct your vision.If glasses are worn for 15-20 minutes a day, noticeable improvements to the vision can be seen. These glasses can also help to relieve VDU (Visual Display Units) eye strain, fatigue and headaches. With this Pinhole Glasses, you can help exercise your eye muscles and relax them as well. Thus, you may likely to experience 10-20% improvement in your vision in 2 to 4 weeks!</p> <p>With the constant use of digital gadgets, TV series marathons and reading in terrible lighting; we're all bound to develop vision problems of some sort. A great drinking game of chance and luck, where everyone ends up being a winner.</p> <p><strong>How it Works:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Get 2-6 people who like to have fun and have each player choose one of the colored shot glasses and a matching playing chip.</li> <li>The players fill their shot glasses evenly and choose a slot to place their glass in at the bottom of the board.&nbsp;</li> <li>Once a player chooses a slot, they must remain there until the end of one round of play.&nbsp;</li> <li>Players take turns dropping their chips anywhere along the top opening of the Drinko game board.&nbsp;</li> <li>The player whose shot glass occupies the spot where the Drinko chip lands must drink their shot and refill/replace their glass back in the spot it came from for play to resume.&nbsp;</li> <li>If the player's chip lands in its own slot, the player gets a pass and everyone else must take their shot.&nbsp;</li> </ul> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20140328/Drinko_detail.jpg" width="600" height="3031" /></p> 1860760 Universal Back Seat Car Mount Holder for Tablet PC: Suitable for iPad and Samsung Galaxy Tab. The leak proof screw cap ensures every delicious bite stays securely inside - definitely no leakage here!&nbsp;<br />Available in three colorful vegetable colours: Tomato, Pumpkin & Green Pea.</p> <p>Information on Vacuum Insulation Technology – basically the air between two thin layers of stainless steel that make up the body of the outer container is removed to &nbsp;create a vaccum. Because there is no air the temperature on the other side of the wall does not transfer over keeping contents hot or cold for hours. This technology is superior to foam or the use of double walls to maintain temperature.</p> <p>Tips on helping food retain their heat - Always pre-heat your thermal food jar with boiling hot water for approximately 5 - 10 minutes. Empty the hot water and add pre-heated food into the thermal jar. Food should also be pre-heated on the stove rather than in the microwave as food heated in a microwave does not retain heat for long periods. With a few minutes of preparation, you can enjoy hot food in your thermal jar.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141016/Tiger_detail.jpg" height="3171" width="600" /></p> 1863533 Fix It Wood: Instant Action Scratch Remover for Wood Surfaces. Then you will transfer to the Tanah Lot, enroute to Tanah Lot you will stop at local flower & fruit market. Tanah Lot is a temple buit on an ocean-rock on the exotic west coast of Bali. After visiting Tanah Lot Temple you will transfer back to hotel.</p> <p class="p1"><strong>2hrs Spa Treatment + Transfer (S$60/pax)</strong></p> <p class="p1">You will pick up at the hotel then you will transfer to have Spa Treatment at Halo Bali Spa. The&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">ancientcity walls and the hritage of ancient battleground which&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">has longstories still showed their mystic charm to visitors.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">When night falls, transfer to Hotel for a good day’s&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">rest.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Accommodation: 5-Star Howard Johnson Tianyuan Resort&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Jiuzhaigou or similar</span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Day 3 (Thu/Sat): Jiuzhaigou Nature Reserve (B,-,D)</span></strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After breakfast visit to Jiuzhaigou Nature Reserve in the&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">northwestof Sichuan. It is formed by forested mountains and high mountain peaks </span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">covered with eternal snow, lush vegetation&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">alternates withgrass steppes, lakes, rivers and bizarre waterfalls. The beautiful </span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">sight spots like Shuzhengqungou, Zezhawagou and Rizegou&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">andso on.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Upon arrival, you will be transferred to hotel for a good&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">day’s rest.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Accommodation: 5-Star Howard Johnson Tianyuan Resort&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Jiuzhaigou or similar</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>Day 4 (Fri/Sun): Jiuzhaigou Nature Reserve-Taoping&nbsp;Village-Chengdu (B,L,D)</strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After breakfast, continues to visit the Museum of China&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">TibetanTea, and the Museum of West Minerals.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Then proceed to Taoping Village, the Qiang Stockade&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Village of Taoping, which is located in the Lixian County of Aba&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, and about 158km away from&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Chengdu. The Qiang Stockade Village of Taoping was built in 111BC.&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">It was valued as the“ living fossil” of the Qiang&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">nationality architecture art.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Upon arrival, you will get back to Chengdul for a good&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">day’s rest.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Accommodation: 5-Star Howard Johnson Agile Plaza Chengdu&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">or similar</span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Day 5 (Sat/Mon): Chengdu-Le’shan-Mt. E’Mei (B,L,D)</span></strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">This morning, visit the silk factory firstly, then&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">proceed towards to Mt. E’Mei, visit the famous Le’shan Grand Buddha by&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">cruise. The Le’shan Grand Buddha is one of the biggest stone Buddhist statues in the world.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After that, continue to visit Mt. E’Mei, which lies seven&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">kilometers southwest of Emeishan City and is one of the four&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">mountain ranges in China that Buddhists consider sacred. The&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">mountain stretches more than 200 kilometers from south to north.&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Its mainpeak, Wanfo Top, is 3,099 meters above sea level. Since&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">ancient times Emei Mountain has been described as "Beauty Under Heaven". We will take you to visit the most two famous&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">temples called Baoguo Temple and the Fuhu Temple.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Accomodation: 5-Star E’mei Shanyue Garden Hotel or&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">similar</span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Day 6 (Sun/Tue): Mt. Huanglongxi is an ancient&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">town with a history of more than 1,700 years, and greatly&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">admired by visitors for its beautiful natural scenery and ancient&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Chinese culture. With many scenic places of interest, Huanglongxi&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Old Town has seven ancient streets, which were all paved with&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">stone slabs, and the porch columns on both sides are orderly&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">arrayed. Besides, there are three ancient temples in the central&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">street, attracting many tourists from home and abroad.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After reaching Chengdu, we’ll look around a famous peal&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">factory and rubber factory.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Finish all day’s pleasant trip, you will get a good rest&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">in hotel.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Accommodation: 5-Star Howard Johnson Agile Plaza Chengdu&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">or similar</span></li> </ul> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Day 7 (Mon/Wed): Chengdu (B,L,D)</span></strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After breakfast, visit to the attractive and beautiful&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">city Chengdu by coach. With Qin, Han,&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">and Three-kingdom cultures as its soul, the social style of&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Ming and Qing dynasties as its appearance, the West Sichuan&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">folkways and customs as its body. With The UAE's accession, Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary (RAKWS) has become the Nation's first Ramsar wetland site. RAKWS is located at the head of the 14km long, watercourse known as Dubai Creek, and covers an area of 620 hectares featuring sabkhas, saline flats; intertidal mudflats; mangroves; small lagoons and pools, and a few tiny islands which lie at theinterface between the Persian Gulf and the Al Awir Desert.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Next, we shall head to the Dubai Mall. Located in the heart the prestigious Downtown Dubai, described as ‘The Centre of Now,’ is The Dubai Mall, the world’s largest shopping and entertainment destination. It welcomes more than 75million visitors in 2013. With 1,200 retail stores over 200 food and beverage outlets. Carry on the Dubai Mall Fountain Show, Set on the 30-acre Burj Khalifa Lake, the fountain shoots water jets as high as 500 ft (150 metres), equivalent to that of a 50-storeybuilding. The fountain is 900 ft (275 metres) long and has five circles of varying sizes and two central arcs. It was designed by California-based WET, the creators of the Fountains of Bellagio in Las Vegas.</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>Day 3: Dubai (Breakfast, Dinner)</strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">After breakfast, we shall head to carpet making demo at the Saga Islamic Art Centre. In the harsharid lands of Arabia, the message of the prophet (PBUH) of Islam was to bring new hope to the hearts of men. His strong yet simple message of divine love and devotion transformed all aspects of life and thought. Work became a form of worship, and art a celebration of divine beauty.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Next, we shall transfer to the Mall of the Emirates for a non-guided tour. Mall of the Emirates is a shopping mall which was opened in November 2005 and it developed & owned by Majid al-Futtaim Properties and located in Dubai at interchange four on Sheikh Zayed Road. The multi-level shopping center currently featuresmore than 560 international brands, more than 700 stores, 11 anchor stores with a total gross leasablearea (GLA) of 234,479 sqm including department.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Tonight we shall enjoy the half day desert Safari tour on the desert. It is located at the heart of commercial business district of Deira, in the locality of Al Dhagaya. The hours of operation are: Sat-Thursday 10:00am – 1:00pm; then 4:00pm to 10:00pm. Fridays from 4:00pm to 10:00pm. The souk consists of some three hundred retailers that trade almost exclusively in gems, stones and metals of high value. Without a doubt it is a place where fashion is King and Queen.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Next, transfer to the Deira Creek for the Dhow Cruise with a 5-star dinner. Enjoy a relaxing 2-hour tour of Dubai Creek under the evening stars and feast on international treats as you cruise! Fortunately, this product is powered by the sun, so there are no batteries required. Being unbelieably soft and gentle, konjac sponge exfoliates dead cells while wiping the face and body, and leaves behind a colloid film to nourish and protect your skin.</p> <p style="text-align: center;">It's perfect for cleansing even the most sensitive skin!</p> <p style="text-align: center;">A Konjac Sponge contains no preservatives or artificial pigment.</p> <p style="text-align: center;"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_imce_ops/konjac-spong-detail1.jpg" height="497" width="600" /></p> <p style="text-align: center;"><img src="http://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/upload_imce_ops/konjac-sponge-detail2.jpg" height="503" width="600" /></p> <p style="text-align: center;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Main Benefits</strong></span></p> <p style="text-align: center;"><strong>Safety</strong>:&nbsp;The sponge is 100% natural by fermenting the edible konjac fiber. It increases cardiovascular and muscular endurance, build core strength, improve range-of-motion, flexibility, and burn calories, all while building muscle.</p> <p>Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer asymmetrical counterweight combines conventional weightlifting with the benefits of a movable, shifting weight. The units also feature ergonomically-designed, 360-degree rotating grips, which provide greater versatility, comfort and control that engage the core.</p> <p>The Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer improves your cardiovascular and muscular endurance with a complete conditioning and strengthening workout with one compact, handheld, machine. It provides a complete cardiovascular and strength conditioning system that burns fat, increases endurance, strengthens muscles and accelerates the metabolism.</p> <p>The Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer designs equipment for general fitness that benefits both men and women. Regardless of your level of fitness or your fitness goals, The Burn Machine has a unit to meet your needs.</p> <p>The Advance Burn-Ring Machine can be used for general fitness, as well as sports specific training such as golf, tennis and any activity that benefits from strong shoulder and core stabilization. The Burn-Ring Machine is also a favorite training tool of mixed martial artists and tactical athletes because of its unique ability to strengthen core muscles while increasing cardiovascular and muscular endurance. Physical and rehabilitation therapists find the Burn Machine’s unique design makes for a more portable and less expensive alternative to the upper-body ergometers (UBE) commonly found in therapy facilities.&nbsp;</p> <p>The Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer’s unique design allows users to get a cardiovascular workout from virtually any position—standing, sitting or even reclining. It improves muscular strength and endurance, while also increasing range of motion, particularly in the shoulders, forearms and wrists.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail1.jpg" /></p> <p><strong>4 Pounds</strong></p> <p><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Burn calories and tone muscles with the 4 Pound Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer. At four pounds, this exercise unit is light enough for longer, more cardio-intense workouts to help uncover sculpted shoulders, arms, back and torso muscles, while increasing aerobic and muscular endurance. The 4 Pound Burn-Ring Machine for a variety of workout applications from advanced athletic training to injury rehabilitation. This unit also makes a great addition to group workout classes.</span></p> <p><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail2.jpg" /><br /></span></p> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">8 Pounds</span></strong></p> <p>The 8 Pound Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer is perfect for enhancing cardiovascular conditioning and toning muscles. This is one of the most efficient pieces of equipment in the world for a workout on the go. It works perfectly while sitting or standing. It can also accommodate the specific needs of individuals in physical rehabilitation programs and in wheelchairs. Although eight pounds may not sound like a lot of weight, it offers a workout that packs a punch! The unit weight combined with its mechanics is what supplies users with a high-level workout.</p> <p>This light-weight exercise unit is perfect for women, teens, seniors or anyone starting an upper body fitness regimen. The ease of use and virtually non-existent risk of injury makes the unit a perfectly versatile exercise device for the whole family. It also works great in group activities or when incorporated in an aerobics or martial arts class that would benefit from the inclusion of a lightweight performance tool.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail3.jpg" /></p> <p><strong>12 Pounds</strong></p> <p>With the same features and benefits as eight-pound unit, the 12 Pound Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer Machine offers more challenging weight resistance. This model is designed for those who have experience with lifting weights or for those participating in sports that require an elite level of upper-body endurance.</p> <p>The 12 pounds of weight combined with the mechanics of the exercise produce an intense workout for all users. This model offers the user a challenging and unique workout already experienced by many of the world's most elite professional athletes.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail4.jpg" /></p> <p><strong>Instructions:</strong></p> <p>The signature exercise of the Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer Machine mimics the punching motion of a conventional speed bag workout. The 360-degree rotating grips allow you to naturally find the position that is safest and most comfortable, while also providing endless versatility. The Advance Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer’s unique design allows you to work out from a standing, sitting, or even reclining position. Use the Advance Burn-Ring Machine standing or walking to increase your cardiovascular endurance. Use it sitting at your desk for a midday energy burst. Use it in a reclining position to maximize your abdominal routine. From physical therapy patients to advanced athletes, and everyone in between, the Burn-Ring Machine is the tool of choice for burning calories and building strength.</p> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail5_0.jpg" /></p> <p><strong>Tips For Use:</strong></p> <ul> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Which level of the trainer you choose should depend on your fitness level and your fitness goals. The Burn-Ring Fitness Trainer is great for increasing cardiovascular and muscular endurance, which makes it popular for general fitness and weight loss, as well as for use in mixed martial arts training, tactical fitness, sports-specific training, physical therapy and sports injury rehabilitation.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">As you get stronger, you can increase the intensity by raising your elbows higher or by holding the unit farther away from your body. You can also challenge yourself by increasing the speed and duration of each exercise.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The 4 Pound Burn-Ring Fitness Machine is primarily used by people who want to use the unit for extended periods of cardio or by people who are rehabilitating from an injury or illness.&nbsp;</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The 8 Pound Burn-Ring Fitness Machine is usually challenging enough for most people with an average to above average level of physical fitness. Statistically, women most often choose this size Burn Machine.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The 12 Pound Burn-Ring Fitness Machine is for people with an advanced level of upper-body conditioning. Statistically, men most often choose this size Burn Machine.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The machines should be maintenance free. However, some units may require occasional retightening of the bolts. Also, temperature changes can sometimes make the rotation of the handles feel stiff. If this happens, simply spray lubricant type "dry silicone spray" into all four grooves of the handles. Over time, lubrication of the unit may result in a powdery substance appearing on the handles. Simply wipe that handles down with water and a mild cleaning solution and the powder will disappear.</span></li> </ul> <p><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20141231/Advance-Burn-Ring-Fitness-Trainer-Machine-Detail6.jpg" height="2159" width="600" /></p> 1879158 T4 Solar Transform T-Rex: Go Through The Learning Journey Of Solar Energy With Your Child. Courier Delivery Option Available http://www.alldealsasia.com/affiliate/35852/daily-deal/ada/singapore/draw-your-track-inductive-tank-tech-toy-draw-line-and-watch-tank-follow-27Apr2015 https://www.alldealsasia.com/sites/default/files/deals/inductive-tank-main.jpg S$29.9 S$15.9 47.00% 2015-04-27 11:00 2015-05-05 11:00 2015-11-30 11:00 12 2015-11-30 Kids Champion 00 00 Kids <p><iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/qCSjnG_4yNU" frameborder="0" height="315" width="600"></iframe></p> <p>This fascinating tank does not need a track to guide it; just a simple black line. Draw any shaped track with the included marker (felt tip) pen (or use your own), switch the tank on and watch it follow the line. Great fun for kids 5 and up!</p> <p><strong>How to Play:</strong></p> <ol> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Use an ordinary dark colored crayon or felt-tipped marker to draw a line on a white piece of paper.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Turn on switch on the button of the tank.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">Place tank on top of the drawn line.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">The tank will run on the line automatically.</span></li> <li><span style="line-height: 20.3999996185303px;">If the line is finished, the tank will continue in the direction followed from the previous line.</span></li> </ol> <p><strong>Note:</strong></p> <p>If the line is too thin, the tank may stray off the line. It is advisable to make the line thicker (about&nbsp;<span>a quarter inch thick)</span>. The sun, daylight lamp, or any shining paper might damage the tank's sensor. Be thrilled no end by unique encounters with marine animals. Feed gentle rays and sharks, defy gravity feeding fishes through openings at the side of the MAGIC-T tank, spot masters of disguise like the amazing mimic octopus, allow giant isopods to crawl all around you and even tunnel under the sea on an 83m long voyage to the colourful Reef and Ocean Colonies!</p> <p class="p1"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_20140328/dophin-detail2_1.jpg" height="485" width="600" /></p> <p class="p1"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Dolphin Lagoon Show:</span></p> <p class="p1">Set amidst lush landscaping and situated right next to Underwater World Singapore, the all-new state-of-the-art Dolphin Lagoon completes a seamless journey of discovery in to the ocean's depths. And bringing all the action closer to you is the panoramic viewing platform overlooking the performance arena. Have a splashing good time as you come up close to pink dolphins spy-hopping and tail-walking their way into your heart.&nbsp;</p> <p class="p1"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_imce2/dophin-detail1_0.jpg" height="414" width="600" /></p> <p class="p1"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Luge:</span></p> <p class="p1">Part go-cart, part toboggan, the Luge offers a truly unique outdoor experience suitable for all ages that is not found anywhere else in Singapore or Southeast Asia. Giving you full control, navigate down 650 metres of the Jungle Trail or 688 metre of the Dragon Trail as thrillingly fast or cruising slow as you like.</p> <p class="p1"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_imce2/luge.jpg" height="315" width="600" /></p> <p class="p1"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_imce2/luge%20%26%20skyride.jpg" height="365" width="600" /></p> <p class="p1"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Skyride:</span></p> <p class="p1">For those who like to take things a little easier, jump aboard the Skyride for a scenic adventure on a 4 seater chairlift that gives you a bird's eye view of the Singapore skyline and the South China Sea while engrossed in the natural habitat of Sentosa Island, you might also see the cheeky cockatoos that often entertain guests.</p> <p class="p1"><img src="/sites/default/files/upload_imce2/skyride.jpg" height="400" width="600" /></p> <p class="p1"><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Segway Fun Ride:</span></p> <p class="p1">Never tried a Segway Personal Transporter before?
